function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 can be transmitted by inhaling the virus from more than one and a half meters.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in indoor environments.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air filtration, wearing masks, and minimizing time spent in enclosed spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC filters, and smart ventilation systems.","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, especially in crowded spaces.","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Spread of particles from infected individuals throughout a room or indoor location.","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection within indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing, wearing masks, and improving ventilation to disperse and filter out particles.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring air quality, air purifiers, and HVAC systems.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially in crowded settings.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Aerosols remaining in the air after a person leaves a room, potentially remaining airborne for hours.","Impact":"Risk of exposure to lingering aerosols containing the virus.","Mitigation":"Enhancing ventilation to remove lingering aerosols, wearing masks, and minimizing time spent in enclosed spaces.","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, air purifiers, and HVAC filters.","People":"Individuals entering indoor spaces after an infected person has left.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."}]}
